translations: n.大蒜；大蒜头；用于有相似气味的植物名中

phrs.translation: n. 蒜蓉面包；香蒜面包

sentences.sentence: Just rub some bread with fresh garlics and plenty of ripe tomatoes, then drizzle with olive oil and salt.
sentences.translation: 只需把新鲜的蒜瓣和熟番茄酱擦在面包上，然后加少许橄榄油和盐。

sentences.sentence: Today, I lent you a candle, maybe tomorrow you would come here to brorrow onions, gingers and garlics, no, no!
sentences.translation: 今天借给他家蜡烛，说不定明天又来借葱、借姜、借蒜，不，不行！

sentences.sentence: Growing characters and quality of Nanou garlic, which were contrasted with Russian and Cangshan garlics, were studied in this article.
sentences.translation: 本研究就南欧蒜与普通大蒜(苏联蒜和苍山蒜)生长发育特性、抗逆性及品质等进行了比较研究。
